articles.description: Infrequent periods and unexplained weight gain? It could be polycystic ovary syndrome or #PCOS: the most common hormonal disorder in women of childbearing age. Despite its high prevalence, many have never heard of it.
articles.content: Eventually, she got a response from a US-based doctor who advised her to try metformin, a diabetes drug now often prescribed to PCOS patients. This was still the early days of PCOS awareness, so the … [+206 chars]
